name: Mas Chicken Flavoured Seasoning Cube
description: Introducing Ma`s Kitchen Chicken Seasoning cube, a culinary treasure that holds the key to creating flavorful and aromatic dishes with utmost convenience. Ma`s Kitchen Chicken seasoning cube is meticulously crafted to bring out the essence of various ingredients, adding depth and complexity to your cooking like never before. *Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
